channel.title: Someone plz help!custom item editing
channel.description: Here's my prob. i made some custom items and when ever i wield it wields as wep even though its a lava pl8 body. So i need to make it go in the torso slot. Some one plz help!

item.title: Someone plz help!custom item editing
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

Okay first of all go into your folder with all of your server info. Next go and open item.java and scroll down until you find body and then a whole bunch of numbers. Go to the end of those numbers and put the lava platebody id in this format:

14333, 13313,
lets say 13313 is lava pl8,
click right after the last number then press comma then space then type nuumber id and then do the same thign to item4.java then compile then there u go, did that answer ur question?

Read full topic
